articles.description: The discovery of the burrowing dinosaur, Fona herzogae, from the mid-Cretaceous period reveals a complex ecosystem with dinosaurs occupying subterranean niches. This underscores the diversity and ecological adaptability of dinosaurs, broadening our understand…
articles.content: Fona herzogae, a recently discovered dinosaur from Utah, likely lived partially underground, evidenced by its anatomical adaptations and frequent fossil preservation in burrows, reshaping our underst… [+6235 chars]
